trans-unit.source: When a script reference is rendered, the ScriptReferenceEventArgs object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object that is defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance.
trans-unit.target: ScriptReferenceEventArgs 物件轉譯的指令碼參考時，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>中定義的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object and modify it as needed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>事件，以檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件，並視需要修改。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref>物件，其中包含參考在網頁上的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the script library.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref>物件，其中包含指令碼程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object in the Script property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>物件中的指令碼屬性加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>屬性時<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref>物件，其中包含參考在網頁上的用戶端指令碼。
